
                            
                            <p>VX扫码，进去后点击下载手机银行，进入话费活动注册领取页面 <br>  <br> 立减金： <br> 每月app搜立减金1元买10元 <br> 每月游乐园还继续兑换立减金 <br> 几天内当地银行还会短信通知领取40到50块的VX立减金 <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/063028w1px4grppeep3s01.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/063028w1px4grppeep3s01.png"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/063038u0bauqrscuuburzw.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/063038u0bauqrscuuburzw.png"><img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/062755zo7zbsss7d9eebsy.jpeg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/18/062755zo7zbsss7d9eebsy.jpeg"> <br> </p>
